name: Thruster (itch) (Eikins, Thomas HERVE)
description:
Take a deep dive into the Hyper-SubZero-OrWhateverYouWant Space and collect gates until you go at the speed of light !

To play, just tap the Space Bar to change your Ship phase and cross the gates !

Credits

  • Julien Delaunay - VFX
  • Noé Masse - Game Art & VFX
  • lumosc - Programming (UI)
  • Thomas Hervé - Programming (General) & Salt Manager
  • François-Xavier Gros - Programming (Gameplay)

Special Thanks to Dylan M for being the pointer !
